Template Function evaporation¶

  • Defined in File user_functions.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
void evaporation(float_t &qv_prime, float_t &e_d, float_t &p_sat, float_t &s_sw, float_t &T_prime, float_t &q1, float_t &N1, float_t &resq, particle_model_constants_t &pc1, std::vector<float_t> &res, const double &dt_prime)¶

Evaporation from melting ice particles.

qv_prime Water vapor mixing ratio e_d Partial pressure of water vapor p_sat Saturation pressure of water [Pa] s_sw Super saturation of water T_prime Temperature [K] q1 Mixing ratio of any ice particle N1 Particle number of any ice particle resq On out: difference of the ice particle mixing ratio pc1 Model constants specific for the given ice particle res Vector to store the changes dt_prime Time step size [s]
